{{also|Hund}} ==German== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|de|Hund|in}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Hündinnen}} # female [[dog]], [[bitch]], [[she-dog]] # short for [[Wolfshündin]], [[Fuchshündin]], etc. # [[slut]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|nen}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|Hundeweibchen}} * {{l|de|weiblich|weiblicher}} {{l|de|Hund}} * {{qualifier|Upper German}} {{l|de|Zaupe}} ====Coordinate terms==== * {{l|de|Hundemännchen}} * {{l|de|Hunderüde}} * {{l|de|Hundsrüde}} * {{l|de|männlich|männlicher}} {{l|de|Hund}} * {{l|de|Rüde}} * {{l|de|Fuchsrüde}} * {{l|de|Wolfsrüde}} ====Derived terms==== {{der-top}} * {{l|de|Dackelhündin}} * {{l|de|Fuchshündin}} * {{l|de|Haushündin}} * {{l|de|Schäferhündin}} {{der-mid}} * {{l|de|Teckelhündin}} * {{l|de|Wildhündin}} * {{l|de|Wolfshündin}} {{der-bottom}} ====See also==== * {{l|de|Canidae}} ([[Kaniden]]) * {{l|de|Füchsin}} * {{l|de|Kojotin}} * {{l|de|Schakalin}} * {{l|de|Wölfin}} ===References=== * [http://www.dict.cc/?s=Hündin Hündin] (dict.cc, German to English dictionary) ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Dogs]]
